CustomField.description: Number of Days a plan is on hold
CustomField.formula: IF( Plan_Hold_Date__c > DATE(1900,01,01), IF( Actual_Plan_Release_Date__c > DATE(1900,01,01), ( Actual_Plan_Release_Date__c - Plan_Hold_Date__c), (TODAY()-Plan_Hold_Date__c)), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of Days a plan is on hold
CustomField.label: Plan Hold Days
